hymn.title: Lord, I love You more today, than any other

layout.singingstanza: Lord, I love You more to -- day, than an -- y oth -- er. Lord, I love You more right now, than ev -- er be -- fore. Lord, You are so dear, how could my heart de -- sire An -- y -- thing that's less than You; Lord, You are the One I must choose; Lord, I love You. Lord, I need You more to -- day, than an -- y oth -- er. Lord, I need You more right now, than ev -- er be -- fore. Lord, You are so near, be ev -- ery -- thing to me, I could -- n't live a day with -- out You; I'm to -- tal -- ly de -- pen -- dent on You; Lord, I need You. Lord, I love You, I'll nev -- er let You go. Lord, I love You, I want You to know, Lord, I love You so.

lyrics.stanza: Lord, I love You (Lord, I love You), I'll never let You go (won't let You go). Lord, I love You, I want You to know, Lord, I love You so.
